acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU CRAVE CHALLENGES TO EXPRESS YOURSELF AND ALWAYS SEEK PASSION IN LIFE
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU CRAVE CHALLENGES TO EXPRESS YOURSELF AND ALWAYS SEEK PASSION IN LIFE

{FIRSTNAME} When I tune into your soul I feel a bright, electric, passionate vibration, full of fun and motivation.

A passionate soul thrives on new ideas and upbeat energy, instinctively turning away from anything that puts out your spark.

Some may think you’re “too hot to handle”… but I also sense a sensitive, thoughtful core underneath your colorful thunder and lightning.

Your soul needs to roam freely, but also seeks loyalty and love…

You’re the best version of yourself when you focus on a breakthrough idea, preferably something that stirs up excitement and fun.

But there’s some imbalance here too... you feel it in moments of boredom, when things get repetitive, or don’t go exactly as planned…

This sometimes wears down your energetic battery, and it may take you time to recharge and bounce back.

It’s essential for you to find a way to balance your energy so you don’t burn out and dim your bright flame in the world, {FIRSTNAME}.

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding finding that balance now.

You’re always looking for signs to inspire your creative mind, and open to ideas that light your fire.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back all these years from expressing your ultimate potential.
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT THE MOST OUT OF LIFE, YOU MUST RELEASE SOME CONTROL…

Your energy is incredible {FIRSTNAME}, I can feel the force of your drive to succeed.

So it makes total sense for someone like yourself… with so much creative energy to fall into the habit of controlling how things progress.

However your energy reading suggests that what you seek the most will only be found if you can RELEASE some of the control you hold onto with an iron grip.

It is incredibly hard to raise your frequency when you’re afraid to let go of the reigns…

This shadow side of your energy can block you and others around you… stunting true magic from flowing into your life.

The good news is that you can raise your frequency by letting go…

This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}.

The decisions you make now regarding letting go of both control and things that no longer serve you will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

And the way to know if you’re going the right direction on your path can be found through a light reading…

I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
Your light reading is STRONG {FIRSTNAME}

I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

Your unique light deserves to be seen, but the best things in life come... when they’re allowed to unfold like a flower… naturally.

By releasing the need to be in constant control you will relax into your highest potential... which will also allow others you creatively collaborate with to do the same.

This will propel you along your path to any goal you chose, leaving behind an inspiring, brave and genius message with your personalized stamp on it.
